document_data.title: Fathomless Pits of Ill Intent
document_data.design: [[Eric Menge]]{{Cite adventurers league/Fathomless Pits of Ill Intent|1}}
document_data.mainbody:
'''''Fathomless Pits of Ill Intent''''' is an adventure module set in the ''Forgotten Realms'' using the ''Dungeons & Dragons'' 5{{th}} edition ruleset. It is part of the ''[[Adventurers League/Tomb of Annihilation|Tomb of Annihilation]]'' series of adventures published for the [[Adventurers League|D&D Adventurers League]]. It focuses on [[Chult]], and is an adventure designed for three to seven 11{{th}}- to 16{{th}}-level characters.

{{Quote|''The time is now! The yuan-ti lay on the cusp of freeing an ancient being of insurmountable evil from its imprisonment. Should this happen, Faerûn may very well be plunged into an age of darkness. You have traveled the width and breadth of the peninsula and learned what you could about your foe. Now it’s time to put that knowledge to use. Steel yourself, adventurer, there are important deeds to be done!''|}}
